=== `db_value()` ===

Extracts the value of the `field` after running the `sql` command on a `database` connection.

{{{
variant db_value(string field, string sql)
variant db_value(string field, string sql, Database database)
}}}

|| *`field`* || ... ||
|| *`sql`* || The SQL command to be executed on the database server ||
|| *`db`* || ... ||
|| *returns* || ... ||

string GetSQLValueString( variant theValue, 
                          string  theType, 
                          variant theDefinedValue )

string GetSQLValueString( variant theValue, 
                          string  theType, 
                          variant theDefinedValue, 
                          variant theNotDefinedValue )

|| *`theValue`* || ... ||
|| *`theType`* || <ul><li>`'text'`</li><li>`'long'` or `'int'`</li><li>`'double'`</li><li>`'date'`</li><li>`'defined'`</li></ul>||
|| *`theDefinedValue`* || `[optional]` ||
|| *`theNotDefinedValue`* || `[optional]` ||
